verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Amen!
Hallelujah! Amen!
Hallelujah! Amen!
Amen! Amen!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How oft in holy converse with Christ,
My Lord alone,
I seem to hear the millions
That sing around His throne:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
They passed thro' toils and trials
And, tho' the strife was long,
They share the victor's conquest,
And sing the victor's song:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My soul takes up the chorus
And, pressing on my way,
Communing still with Jesus,
I sing from day to day:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thro' grace I soon shall conquer,
And reach my home on high;
And thro' eternal ages
I'll shout beyond the sky:
